it.sauronsoftware.grab4j.html
Class HTMLDocumentFactory

java.lang.Object
  it.sauronsoftware.grab4j.html.HTMLDocumentFactory

public class HTMLDocumentFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for HTML document representations. Call this class buildDocument() static method to fetch and parse a HTML document.

Author:
Carlo Pelliccia

Method Detail

buildDocument

public static HTMLDocument buildDocument(java.net.URL documentUrl)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         HTMLParseException
This method fetches and parses a HTML document.

Parameters:
documentUrl - The document URL.
Returns:
A document object representation.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown if an I/O error occurs.
HTMLParseException - This exception is thrown if the document cannot be parsed, since it doesn't result to be valid HTML.

public static HTMLDocument buildDocument(java.lang.String documentUrl)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         HTMLParseException
This method fetches and parses a HTML document.

Parameters:
documentUrl - The document URL, as a string.
Returns:
A document object representation.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown if an I/O error occurs.
HTMLParseException - This exception is thrown if the document cannot be parsed, since it doesn't result to be valid HTML.

                                  throws java.io.IOException,

This method reads and parses a HTML document.

Parameters:
reader - The reader from which the document will be read.
Returns:
A document object representation.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown if an I/O error occurs
HTMLParseException - This exception is thrown if the document cannot be parsed, since it doesn't result to be valid HTML.
